plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.arena

类 CAArenaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • plugily.projects.villagedefense.creeperattack.arena.CAArenaManager

  • public class CAArenaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages Creeper Attack arenas: context lifecycle, game loop, win/lose conditions.
